document_data.mainbody:
Helms Hold Journeybread was a type of long-lasting hard biscuit from Helms Hold, a Helmite city and cathedral located in the north of the Sword Coast.
The simplest of breads and travelers rations, these small biscuits were cheap and sold in big batches. They were known to have minor curative qualities.
In the mid-to-late-15 century DR, Journeybread was available for purchased at the citadel of Helms Hold, as well as being served at the Beached Leviathan tavern of Neverwinters Blacklake District.
